name: getDeployments
description: List deployments under the account corresponding to the API token. If a deployment hasn't finished uploading (is incomplete), the `url` property will have a value of `null`.

from.description: Gets the deployment created after this Date timestamp. (default: current time)

limit.description: Maximum number of deployments to list from a request.

target.description: Filter deployments based on the environment.

to.description: Gets the deployment created before this Date timestamp. (default: current time)

users.description: Filter out deployments based on users who have created the deployment.

since.description: Get Deployments created after this JavaScript timestamp.

until.description: Get Deployments created before this JavaScript timestamp.

state.description: Filter deployments based on their state (`BUILDING`, `ERROR`, `INITIALIZING`, `QUEUED`, `READY`, `CANCELED`)

rollbackCandidate.description: Filter deployments based on their rollback candidacy

teamId.description: The Team identifier or slug to perform the request on behalf of.

$ul: **pagination**: This object contains information related to the pagination of the current request, including the necessary parameters to get the next or previous page of data.
**count**: Amount of items in the current page.
**next**: Timestamp that must be used to request the next page.
**prev**: Timestamp that must be used to request the previous page.
